title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1220.4 - Mediation report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1220.4 - Mediation report

State Regulations

Within 10 days following the conclusion of
the mediation, the mediator shall send a report to the disciplinary office
advising of any disposition. (a) If the parties have resolved their
dispute by mediation, the report shall be accompanied by the original written
agreement signed by both parties, together will all other correspondence
related to the dispute. Copies of the agreement shall be provided to the
parties. (b) If the
parties are unable to resolve their dispute, the complaint shall be returned to
the disciplinary office for appropriate action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1220.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
